name: Number Two Ice Cream Shop!
description:
Number Two Ice Cream Shop! is a silly 2D mobile game where you play as a little gnome working in an ice cream shop. Catch as much ice cream as you can and serve them to your enthusiastic customers while avoiding trash falling onto the ice cream.

  • Controls: A/D or Left/Right arrows keys = move
  • Status: Currently playable on PC and Mac. Final release for Android in Fall 2020.
  • Showcased in and livestreamed at USC Games Expo 2020.
  • This game was developed in partnership with USC Games and Tokyo University of the Arts (Geidai). 
  • Contact information of team:
    • Joanna Shen
    • Muyang Li
    • ShuShu Li
    • Justin Schornstein
